name: CUBIC (itch) (gizop)
description:
CUBIC is a simple puzzle game for people who love cubes and colors.

Paint squares on the cube to connect matching colors on each level.

Features:
• Simple gameplay
• 60 different levels to use your cubical thinking skills on
• Gradually increasing cubicness as you progress throughout the game
• Cubiquitous: Optimized for both tablets and phones

The most cubic game we've ever made.
